name: Ice Cream Sundae Milkshake - Frozen Desserts Maker
name_original: Ice Cream Sundae Milkshake - Frozen Desserts Maker
description:
I've got good news for you! There was a super cool ice cream shop opened in the downtown yesterday! This shop sells all kinds of the most popular ice creams! Such as cloud ice cream, classic ice cream, and my favorite churro ice cream!
Do you want to try these amazing trendy ice creams? Well, just come with me! Let's get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy ice creams
-Three kinds of ice creams to make: cloud ice cream, churro ice cream and classic ice cream
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: flour sieve, spatula, mixer, ice cream mold, freezer, induction cooker, fryer, cotton candy maker and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: sugar, eggs, milk, butter, salt, seasoning, brown sugar, vanilla extract and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different courses for cloud ice cream, churro ice cream and classic ice cream
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits and cream toppings
